name: MyNextPublicTransport
0:
“Alexa, Abre mi siguiente tren”
“cuando es mi siguiente tren”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mi siguiente tren
des:
This is a personal project only destined to be used in my home, It allows us to ask Alexa when is our next train to the city, taking into account delays.
No account is needed

We just say in spanish "Alexa, Abre mi siguiente tren" and ask "Cuándo es mi siguiente tren" and we get an answer from it
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
